column1: #Text=Buck English was an American Old West outlaw , and one of Lake County , California 's most notorious thieves and stagecoach robbers toward the end of the 19th century . [ 1 ]
#Text=Born Lawrence Buchanen English , he soon received the nickname " Buck .
